title: Shutdown
description: Racing has been Roc Krinston’s entire life. He’s sacrificed everything to be where he is today. When an accident throws a caution flag in his face, he realizes its time to jumpstart his personal life and think about something other than racing. Who better to do that with than the beautiful doctor who makes his heart go vroom and is right under his roof? Can Roc make it to the finish line with his sexy doc in tow or will his love life get shutdown before the race even starts?
author: Winter Travers
